scriptedEmail.name: Forum Thread Moved To Private Group
scriptedEmail.description: Sends an email when a thread is moved to an area of the site the subscribed user doesn't have access to.
scriptedEmail.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Body">The thread, {thread_subject}, needed to be moved. You won't be getting anymore notifications for this thread.</resource> <resource name="Subject">{site_name}: {thread_subject} moved</resource> <resource name="Header">{thread_subject} moved</resource> </language>
